name: Emergency Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature crit fail, the additional beast creature has -3 to its AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature sub fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -1 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature succ, the temporary hit points increase by 1.

name: Superior Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature sub succ, the minion is 1 CR higher. Additionally, when upgraded, the minion gains 1 additional AC and AB.

name: Legendary Feed-Pouch
description: On a Befriend Creature crit succ, after rolling for your Boon, you can instead change the result to an Animal result (1). The resulting minion is 2 CR higher, and if upgraded, gains 2 additional AC and AB.

name: Emergency Music Box
description: On a Busk crit fail, the amount of gold lost is reduced by 2.

name: Backup Music Box
description: On a Busk sub fail, the amount of gold lost is reduced by 1.

name: Music Box
description: On a Busk succ, 1 additional gold is gained.

name: Superior Music Box
description: On a Busk sub succ, 2 additional gold is gained.

name: Legendary Music Box
description: On a Busk crit succ, after making your loot roll, you can instead change the result to an Amulet, with its colour tier increased by 1.

name: Emergency Cartographer's Tools
description: On a Chronicle crit fail, the bonus is only reduced by 1.

name: Backup Cartographer's Tools
description: On a Chronicle sub fail, at the end of the next day the party spends in this hex, the bonus is increased by 1.

name: Cartographer's Tools
description: On a Chronicle succ, the expertise die becomes a d6.

name: Superior Cartographer's Tools
description: On a Chronicle sub succ, the bonus is instead increased by 2.

name: Legendary Cartographer's Tools
description: On a Chronicle crit succ, after rolling for your Boon, you can instead change the result to a Route result (3). The route grants 2 days of travel toward instead of 1.

name: Emergency Liquor Flask
description: On an Entertain crit fail, you can choose 2 members of the party to not gain strife.

name: Backup Liquor Flask
description: On an Entertain sub fail, you lose a level of strife the next time you score a substantial success or higher on any journey activity.

name: Liquor Flask
description: On an Entertain succ, the party ignores the next level of fatigue AND strife they would gain.

name: Superior Liquor Flask
description: On an Entertain sub succ, the party removes 1 level of fatigue AND strife.

name: Legendary Liquor Flask
description: On an Entertain crit succ, the party also ignores the next level of fatigue and strife they would gain.

name: Emergency Waterskin
description: On a Force March crit fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -2 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Waterskin
description: On a Force March sub fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -1 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Waterskin
description: On a Force March succ, the party gains an additional half day of travel.

name: Superior Waterskin
description: On a Force March sub succ, the party gains an additional half day of travel.

name: Legendary Waterskin
description: On a Force March crit succ, the party gains an additional day of travel.

name: Emergency Arcane Guidebook
description: On a Gather Components crit fail, the amount of gold lost is reduced by 2.

name: Backup Arcane Guidebook
description: On a Gather Components sub fail, any affected tasks have +1 Accuracy.

name: Arcane Guidebook
description: On a Gather Components succ, 1 additional minor metamagic point is granted.

name: Superior Arcane Guidebook
description: On a Gather Components sub succ, 1 additional moderate metamagic point is granted.

name: Legendary Arcane Guidebook
description: On a Gather Components crit succ, 2 additional moderate metamagic points are granted.

name: Emergency Cultural Guidebook
description: On a Gossip crit fail, you can choose 2 members of the party to not gain strife.

name: Backup Cultural Guidebook
description: On a Gossip sub fail, you lose a level of strife the next time you score a substantial success or higher on any journey activity.

name: Cultural Guidebook
description: On a Gossip succ, gain an additional 10% chance to avoid hostile encounters, or a further +1 to the next knowledge skill check.

name: Superior Cultural Guidebook
description: On a Gossip sub succ, gain an additional 10% chance to avoid hostile encounters, or a further +1 to the next knowledge skill check.

name: Legendary Cultural Guidebook
description: On a Gossip crit succ, after rolling for your Boon, you can instead change the result to a Follower result (4). The resulting follower is 1 tier higher.

name: Emergency Medicinal Guidebook
description: On a Harvest crit fail, you can choose 2 members of the party to not gain fatigue.

name: Backup Medicinal Guidebook
description: On a Harvest sub fail, you lose a level of fatigue the next time you score a substantial success or higher on any journey activity.

name: Medicinal Guidebook
description: On a Harvest succ, gain an additional +1 to the next stabilise check.

name: Superior Medicinal Guidebook
description: On a Harvest sub succ, the potion is tier 2 instead.

name: Legendary Medicinal Guidebook
description: On a Harvest crit succ, the potion is tier 5 instead.

name: Emergency Offerings
description: On a Pray crit fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -2 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Offerings
description: On a Pray sub fail, the curse is slightly less impactful.

name: Offerings
description: On a Pray succ, the blessing is slightly more impactful.

name: Superior Offerings
description: On a Pray sub succ, the blessing is slightly more impactful.

name: Legendary Offerings
description: On a Pray crit succ, after rolling for your Boon, you can instead change the result to a Blessing result (2). The resulting blessing is received twice.

name: Emergency Smoke Bomb
description: On a Rob crit fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -2 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Smoke Bomb
description: On a Rob sub fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -1 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: On a Rob succ, the amount of gold found is increased by 1.

name: Superior Smoke Bomb
description: On a Rob sub succ, the amount of gold found is increased by 2.

name: Legendary Smoke Bomb
description: On a Rob crit succ, after making your loot roll, you can instead change the result to an Ring, with its colour tier increased by 1.

name: Emergency Trailmarkers
description: On a Scout crit fail, affected initiative rolls have a +2 bonus.

name: Backup Trailmarkers
description: On a Scout sub fail, you lose a level of fatigue the next time you score a substantial success on any journey activity.

name: Trailmarkers
description: On a Scout succ, an additional +1 to the next initiative roll is granted.

name: Superior Trailmarkers
description: On a Scout sub succ, and additional +10% chance to surprise is granted.

name: Legendary Trailmarkers
description: On a Scout crit succ, the positive encounter's reward is rolled with advantage.

name: Emergency Excavation Tools
description: On a Seek Shelter crit fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -2 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Backup Excavation Tools
description: On a Seek Shelter sub fail, all foes in the triggered encounter have -1 to their AC and saving throws.

name: Excavation Tools
description: On a Seek Shelter succ, the haven's effects are applied instantaneously, instead of needing to wait for the day's end.

name: Superior Excavation Tools
description: On a Seek Shelter sub succ, the haven's effects are applied instantaneously, instead of needing to wait for the day's end.

name: Legendary Excavation Tools
description: On a Seek Shelter crit succ, after rolling for your Boon, you can instead change the result to a Gold result (8). The resulting gold received is increased by 6.
